Any help is welcome!

item.title: [PI] Money Pouch Freeze
item.dc:creator: @sebblol sebblol
item.description:
@sebblol wrote:

Did you replace this

if(coinToggle){ int cash; String Cash = RSInterface.interfaceCache[8135].disabledMessage; cash = Integer.parseInt(Cash); coinPart.drawSprite(400+11+32, 87); smallText.method382(getMoneyOrbColor(cash), 485, RSInterface.interfaceCache[8134].disabledMessage+"", 102, true); }
Whit this?

if(coinToggle){ int cash; String Cash = RSInterface.interfaceCache[8135].message; cash = Integer.parseInt(Cash); coinPart.drawSprite(400+11+32, 87); smallText.method382(getMoneyOrbColor(cash), 485, ""+RSInterface.interfaceCache[8134].message+"", 102, true); }

Read full topic
